{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Shift Engineer – Mechanical Engineer",
  "description": "Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Shift Engineer &ndash; Mechanical Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Blown Film, Printing, Slitting &amp; Utility

Position Overview


	We are seeking an experienced Shift Engineer &ndash; Mechanical to manage all mechanical &amp; utility operations at our Film plant facility in Ibadan.
	The role demands strong technical expertise and hands-on experience in managing complex Mechanical &amp; Utility systems in a continuous process industry.


Requirements


	Degree / Diploma in Mechanical / Production Engineering.
	6+ years of experience in an industrial Mechanical department, preferably in a film manufacturing plant.


Technical Expertise:


	Hands-on experience in Mechanical &amp; Utility systems. Familiarity with FILM-specific machinery, automation, and process.
	Sound understanding of energy management, safety standards, and preventive maintenance systems.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Shift Engineer – Mechanical Engineer Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Shift Engineer – Mechanical Engineer
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Blown Film, Printing, Slitting & Utility

Position Overview
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced Shift Engineer – Mechanical to manage all mechanical & utility operations at our Film plant facility in Ibadan.
	The role demands strong technical expertise and hands-on experience in managing complex Mechanical & Utility systems in a continuous process industry.


Requirements


	Degree / Diploma in Mechanical / Production Engineering.
	6+ years of experience in an industrial Mechanical department, preferably in a film manufacturing plant.


Technical Expertise:


	Hands-on experience in Mechanical & Utility systems. Familiarity with FILM-specific machinery, automation, and process.
	Sound understanding of energy management, safety standards, and preventive maintenance systems.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Summary


	The Administrative assistant is responsible for monitoring and recording factory staff attendance and punctuality, ensuring compliance with hygiene and discipline standards, and reporting disciplinary or operational issues to management.
	The role also involves supervising hygiene practices across the factory floor, warehouse, and operational areas.


Job Requirements


	OND/HND in any relevant discipline.
	2-3 years of experience in coordination and record keeping.
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.
	Timely submission of weekly activity reports.


Salary
N150,000 - N170,000 per month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-20",

  },

Administrative Assistant Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Administrative assistant is responsible for monitoring and recording factory staff attendance and punctuality, ensuring compliance with hygiene and discipline standards, and reporting disciplinary or operational issues to management.
	The role also involves supervising hygiene practices across the factory floor, warehouse, and operational areas.


Job Requirements


	OND/HND in any relevant discipline.
	2-3 years of experience in coordination and record keeping.
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.
	Timely submission of weekly activity reports.


Salary
N150,000 - N170,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
